Articles.title: 'My 56-year-old Ford Capri is part of the family'
Articles.summary: mr doyle from pyne near exeter originally bought the 1969 capri secondhand for 625 and has since spent more than 40,000 restoring it to "better than factory" condition. He considered scrapping the car in 2012 due to its poor condition but credits his late wife kath for her "amazing vision"

Articles.title: Ontario's Doug Ford says he could cut electricity to US over tariffs
Articles.summary: ontario premier doug ford says he's willing to cut off power supply to us if president donald trump continues with tariffs against canada. ford announced his retaliatory plans shortly after trump implemented a 25 tariff against canadian imported goods and a 10 tariff on canadian energy.

Articles.title: Francis Ford Coppola named worst director at Razzies
Articles.summary: francis ford coppola named worst director at razzies. announced two days before the oscars. The razzie awards name and shame the year's worst films. in an instagram post, external cooppola said he was "thrilled" to accept the award.

Articles.title: 'Trump thinks he can break us' - Ontario's Doug Ford makes bullish victory speech
Articles.summary: ontario's doug ford makes bullish victory speech. "donald trump thinks he can break us," he told the cheering crowds in toronto. ford, who has led ontario since 2018, called the snap election to get a clear mandate to fight us.

Articles.title: Ex-Ford managing director's watch up for auction
Articles.summary: The 1948 gold rolex oyster perpetual 5015 'bubbleback' is set to go under the hammer at kinghams auctioneers in moretoninmarsh, gloucestershire. The watch was rolex's first selfwinding water resistant wrist watch, and was gifted to sir stanford cooper to commemorate his time with ford.

Articles.title: Edmundsâ€™ family SUV test: 2025 Ford Explorer vs. 2025 Honda Pilot
Articles.summary: The 2025 ford explorer and 2025 honda pilot are midsize suvs with three rows of seating, available allwheel drive, and cabins peppered with storage cubbies. Both are highly practical means of running errands, coping with a commute, or tackling long road trips.

Articles.title: Gene Hackman tributes pour in from Francis Ford Coppola, Viola Davis, Bill Murray and more
Articles.summary: Gene hackman, his wife betsy arakawa and their dog were found dead in their new mexico home, authorities said thursday. The loss of a great artist, always cause for both mourning and celebration gene hackman a great actor, inspirin.

Articles.title: Ron Nessen, press secretary to President Ford, dies at 90
Articles.summary: ap ron nessen was press secretary for president gerald ford. He replaced jerald f. terhorst in september 1974 just six weeks into fords presidency. He sought to restore the integrity that the position had lost during the nixon administration.

Articles.title: Ford shows off a treasure trove of rarely seen vehicles to a select few at its Michigan headquarters
Articles.summary: About 50 cars and trucks that are part of ford motor co.'s heritage fleet are on display in dearborn. Some employees checked them out t Tuesday, and the media got a look wednesday. Next month, theyll be available for viewing as part of b
